snippet.title: Marble Power Blast - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Marble Power Blast, a Zuma style Match-3 Bubble shooter game! Get beautiful HD backgrounds in 50 levels and 7 different locations/themes. 
Unlock the random gaming mode and generate your own levels with random calculated difficulty, marble waves, lenght and number of colors. 

Features:
- 50 challenging levels
- 7 different locations/themes
- 3 special items for a better gameplay in different situations
- random mode for endless, automatic generated levels (gets unlocked at level 10)
- high resolution beautiful graphics

Available on Google Play Store and Amazon Underground

Soon:
Amazon FireTV, AmigaOS, Iphone, Ipad, Windows Phone and Blackberry!

More: http://entwickler-x.de/
